questions.question_text: An application developer deploys several applications on the same server. The environment runs on a single operating system and allows the developer to bind dependencies with the application code. Which environment has the code been developed in?

choices.A: The syntax of JSON contains tags, elements, and attributes whereas XML objects are collections of key-value pairs.
choices.C: The syntax of XML contains tags, elements, and attributes whereas JSON objects are collections of key-value pairs.
choices.B: JSON objects are an ordered set of element attributes whereas XML arrays are an unordered set of key-value pairs.
choices.D: JSON arrays are an unordered set of key-value pairs whereas XML objects are an ordered set of element attributes.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C is correct
